Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» Anwar El-Ibrahimi (Omar Metwalley), an Egyptian-born chemical engineer disappears on a flight from South Africa to Washington. His pregnant American wife, Isabella El-Ibrahim (Reese Witherspoon), travels to Washington to try and learn the reason for his disappearance. Meanwhile, Doug Freeman, a CIA analyst (Jake Gyllenhaal), is forced to question the ethics of his assignment as he becomes party to the interogation of Anwar at a secret detention facility somewhere outside of the U.S.A.
